venue.address_1: At the end of Zealand Road
venue.name: Zealand Parking Lot
venue.address_3: drive to the end and park in the lots

item.description:
5 Summits - Zealand, Guyot, West Bond, Bond, Bondcliff
19.5 miles
3,700 foot elevation gain
11:35 book time

The forecast is looking great for Saturday, so we going to do a Zealand-Bonds Traverse.

We will aim to do better than book time including any stops along the way.

We will meet at the Zealand Road Parking area which is 3.6 miles up Zealand Road from Route 302 at 6:45 AM and be on the trail at 7 AM sharp!

Water can be topped off at the hut, but you will not have gone through much at that point. The next easy water source is when we hit the Wilderness Trail at @ mile 15, but will need to be filtered or otherwise made safe to drink. Water is available at the Guyot shelter, but adds distance and elevation to the hike. We recommend 3 - 4 liters per person. This is a hike to pack very light - 19 miles is a long way!

Be sure to carry a headlamp just in case, and bring enough food to last you the day. Don't forget your camera!

A friend who is hiking Liberty & Flume will be waiting with a cooler of cold drinks and will give us a ride back to the start, so we will not need to do a car spot.

Please contact us directly with any questions.
item.name: Zealand-Bonds Traverse - ADVANCED Day Hike
